Text: RE credit updatesJust in case we miss one another this afternoon I will be leaving for BPs office at just a few comments ENE Second line particular misspelled Need period at end of first paragraph Liquidity section since we are closing today and funding tomorrow we should say has executed your call NNG th paragraph increase peak day deliverability for transportation services TW nd paragraph We paid off the million last week as part of our million credit facility rd paragraph this actually sounds worse than what it is of capacity is subscribed for until but sentence implies a lot of turnback risk during next couple of years Big SoCal gas contract comes due in which represents about of total capacity Liquidity section no versus minimal Key credit strengths second bullet regional misspelled Do you include any financial info my cell phone is if you need to reach me Original Message From Hayslett Rod Rod NRONcomENRON COMMUNICATIONS Sent Monday November AM To Cc DeSpain Tim Subject FW credit updates Can you please review and get back to Tim Sent from my BlackBerry Wireless Handheld wwwBlackBerrynet Original Message From DeSpain Tim Tim NRONcom To Hayslett Rod Rod NRONcom Sent Mon Nov Subject FW credit updates Please review the one page updates for Transwestern and Northern and let me know if you have any comments Thanks Tim Original Message From mailto Sent Friday November AM To Subject credit updates Tim Attached are updates I mentioned yesterday See attached file enronrptdocSee attached file northernnaturaldoc See attached file transwesterndoc enronrptdoc File enronrptdoc northernnaturaldoc File northernnaturaldoc transwesterndoc File transwesterndoc
